documents.document: No Trams this morning!!

@PostOffice staff are miserable and come across extremely rude!!
Urgh hate the woman in the post office 😤
So I looked like a beef tomato last night - need to get this weight off 🤦🏼‍♀️
All day wedding tomorrow 👰🏻💍💃🏼🍾🥂
Why is there just a thin bit of hair hanging from Scarlett's pony? 🙈
Urgh so both dresses I've ordered are terrible and I have a wedding on Saturday!!
Wish there were more 12's, always delayed at this time but 5 times as many 26's!! 👎🏼 @on_lothianbuses
Going wedding outfit shopping for my mum today 😰 feel stressed already!
Hate being off work sick! Get so bored being ill 🙄
Why is getting a dress for a wedding such a stress 🤦🏼‍♀️
I was in an unacceptable state last night 🙈
Getting in at this time is fabulous 👌🏽
This day needs to be over 😔
Kept up all night. Literally seen every hour on the clock 😭
Hate being expected to drive everywhere!! No drinks for me today then 👍🏼
230 days to sort my fat life out 👍🏼
Thanks for ruining my Saturday @mrachelx - trying on her outfits for tonight with her legs going for miles ✋🏽🙄
Bacon Roll to start my Friday - diet starts Monday 😂

Right that's it I'm no going

Can see this being a pizza, Xmas movies and wrapping day 👍🏼

Barbara can fuck right off 🙄
My big brothers home today!! 4 years too long 😭❤️
Early finish 🎉👌🏽

Place was absolutely bouncing for Barca vs Real Madrid
Why is there not a 12 to shandwick place for 29mins?! @on_lothianbuses
Aw man super early night for me 😭
Love the light show tonight! Was magical, felt so Christmassy ❤️🎉☃️
Getting up at 6am is catching up with me this week 💤 boss is bringing in breakfast rolls tomorrow though 👌🏽
@cmxxx2 you're not chubby
I'll not be getting the 12 again. Do not make me late on my first day!! ⌚️
Couldn't sleep a wink yet wide awake? The mind boggles 🙇🏼‍♀️
I plan to go ice skating this year ☃️❄️
No matter how many times I watch the Fault in our Stars it never fails to make me ugly cry 😩😢😭
Bought @LManclark the funniest wee xmas pressie today I was laughing all the way to the till 😂🎁
Can't wait to get home and have a cup of tea ☕️
90% of my xmas shopping completed in town today 👌🏽
@reenalal_mua Absolute heaven 👌🏽
I wanna get a winter drink from Costa, get into my onesie and watch the Grinch 🙈
My wee princess Daisy has sprained her wrist 😢 who even knew dogs had wrists! 😂
@Missguided_help trying to order size 4 black block heel gladiator sandal but when I click add to basket it says please select garment size?
Okay so the shops had NOTHING!! Re-wear it is 🙄
Really should go to the gyle and get myself something to wear tomorrow 😴
Missguided = nice clothes with the worst service 👎🏼
@Missguided_help please reply to my DM
@Missguided_help I have but no ones replied
@Missguided_help got given a code last month for 10% off and it doesn't work? Just gets better 👍🏼
Final Friday at Pentland tomorrow 🍾
Excited to have a new job 😬 only 2 and a half weeks left sitting on the phones 🎉🍾

Loooooove love loved @MissGeorgiakx tonight 👊🏼😍
Finally someone's put Chloe in her place 👊🏼
Can't wait for TOWIE tonight. Megan rips into Pete and Georgia rips into Chloe Lewis 🙌🏼

My eyes still have an element of steaming in them 🙄
Cringing at my Snapchat walking for a taxi last night 🙄👍🏼
Think I may actually have to put the heating on 😨
Getting your back cracked is so satisfying 🤗
Hoping I feel better tomorrow for a wee night out 💃🏼
Wedding outfit tested and I'm happy. Now to relax 💆🏼
Eyebrows look shit. Cheers hen 😘

I don't wanna come home 😤☀️🍾🍸👙👫

Well I was in a good mood this morning and now I'm greetin. So glad to be away from work for 2 weeks 💆🏼

So happy in off the phones right up until my holiday...can't deal with chatting to annoying people
People are totally annoying what a shitty day 😒
I can't decide what I need more..cuddles, juice, food
